description: Configures information and tasks for a project. Docs: https://moonrepo.dev/docs/config/project

dependsOn.title: dependsOn
dependsOn.description: Other projects that this project depends on.

env.title: env
env.description: A mapping of environment variables that will be set for all tasks within the project.

fileGroups.title: fileGroups
fileGroups.description: A mapping of group IDs to a list of file paths, globs, and environment variables, that can be referenced from tasks.

id.title: id
id.description: Overrides the ID within the project graph, as defined in the workspace projects setting.
id.markdownDescription: Overrides the ID within the project graph, as defined in the workspace `projects` setting.

language.title: language
language.description: The primary programming language of the project.

owners.title: owners
owners.description: Defines ownership of source code within the current project, by mapping file paths and globs to owners. An owner is either a user, team, or group.

platform.title: platform
platform.description: The default platform for all tasks within the project, if their platform is unknown.

stack.title: stack
stack.description: The technology stack of the project, for categorizing.

tags.title: tags
tags.description: A list of tags that this project blongs to, for categorizing, boundary enforcement, and task inheritance.

tasks.title: tasks
tasks.description: A mapping of tasks by ID to parameters required for running the task.

toolchain.title: toolchain
toolchain.description: Overrides top-level toolchain settings, scoped to this project.
toolchain.markdownDescription: Overrides top-level toolchain settings, scoped to this project.

workspace.title: workspace
workspace.description: Overrides top-level workspace settings, scoped to this project.
workspace.markdownDescription: Overrides top-level workspace settings, scoped to this project.

DependencyConfig.description: Expanded information about a project dependency.

id.title: id
id.description: ID of the depended on project.

source.title: source
source.description: Source of where the dependeny came from.

OwnersConfig.description: Defines ownership of source code within the current project, by mapping file paths and globs to owners. An owner is either a user, team, or group.

customGroups.title: customGroups
customGroups.description: Bitbucket only. A mapping of custom groups (prefixed with @@@), to a list of user and normal groups.
customGroups.markdownDescription: Bitbucket only. A mapping of custom groups (prefixed with `@@@`), to a list of user and normal groups.

optional.title: optional
optional.description: GitLab only. Marks the code owners section as optional.

paths.title: paths
paths.description: A mapping of file paths and file globs to owners. When a list, the defaultOwner is the owner, and each item is a path. When an object, the key is a path, and the value is a list of owners.
paths.markdownDescription: A mapping of file paths and file globs to owners. When a list, the `defaultOwner` is the owner, and each item is a path. When an object, the key is a path, and the value is a list of owners.

requiredApprovals.title: requiredApprovals
requiredApprovals.description: Bitbucket and GitLab only. The number of approvals required for the request to be satisfied. For Bitbucket, utilizes the Check() condition. For GitLab, marks the code owners section as required.
requiredApprovals.markdownDescription: Bitbucket and GitLab only. The number of approvals required for the request to be satisfied. For Bitbucket, utilizes the `Check()` condition. For GitLab, marks the code owners section as required.

OwnersPaths.description: A mapping of file paths and file globs to owners.

ProjectDependsOn.description: Expanded information about a project dependency.

channel.title: channel
channel.description: The Slack, Discord, etc, channel to discuss the project. Must start with a #.
channel.markdownDescription: The Slack, Discord, etc, channel to discuss the project. Must start with a `#`.

description.title: description
description.description: A description on what the project does, and why it exists.

maintainers.title: maintainers
maintainers.description: The individual maintainers of the project. The format is unspecified.

name.title: name
name.description: A human-readable name of the project.
name.markdownDescription: A human-readable name of the project.

owner.title: owner
owner.description: The owner of the project. Can be an individual, team, or organization. The format is unspecified.

version.title: version
version.description: Version of the tool this project will use.

ProjectToolchainConfig.description: Overrides top-level toolchain settings, scoped to this project.
ProjectToolchainConfig.markdownDescription: Overrides top-level toolchain settings, scoped to this project.

disabled.title: disabled
disabled.description: Disables all TypeScript functionality for this project.

includeProjectReferenceSources.title: includeProjectReferenceSources
includeProjectReferenceSources.description: Appends sources of project reference to include in tsconfig.json.
includeProjectReferenceSources.markdownDescription: Appends sources of project reference to `include` in `tsconfig.json`.

includeSharedTypes.title: includeSharedTypes
includeSharedTypes.description: Appends shared types to include in tsconfig.json.

routeOutDirToCache.title: routeOutDirToCache
routeOutDirToCache.description: Updates and routes outDir in tsconfig.json to moon's cache.
routeOutDirToCache.markdownDescription: Updates and routes `outDir` in `tsconfig.json` to moon's cache.

syncProjectReferences.title: syncProjectReferences
syncProjectReferences.description: Syncs all project dependencies as references in tsconfig.json.
syncProjectReferences.markdownDescription: Syncs all project dependencies as `references` in `tsconfig.json`.

syncProjectReferencesToPaths.title: syncProjectReferencesToPaths
syncProjectReferencesToPaths.description: Syncs all project dependencies as paths in tsconfig.json.
syncProjectReferencesToPaths.markdownDescription: Syncs all project dependencies as `paths` in `tsconfig.json`.

ProjectWorkspaceConfig.description: Overrides top-level workspace settings, scoped to this project.
ProjectWorkspaceConfig.markdownDescription: Overrides top-level workspace settings, scoped to this project.

include.title: include
include.description: Only inherits tasks by ID, and ignores the rest. When not defined, inherits all matching tasks. When an empty list, inherits no tasks.

rename.title: rename
rename.description: Renames inherited tasks to a new ID.

TaskArgs.description: Configures a command to execute, and its arguments.

TaskConfig.description: Configures a task to be ran within the action pipeline.

args.title: args
args.description: Arguments to pass to the command when it's ran. Can be defined as a string, or a list of individual arguments.

command.title: command
command.description: The command or command line to execute when the task is ran. Supports the command name, with or without arguments. Can be defined as a string, or a list of individual arguments.

deps.title: deps
deps.description: Other tasks that this task depends on, and must run to completion before this task is ran. Can depend on sibling tasks, or tasks in other projects, using targets.

description.title: description
description.description: A human-readable description about the task.
A human-readable description about the task.

env.title: env
env.description: A mapping of environment variables that will be set when the task is ran.

extends.title: extends
extends.description: Extends settings from a sibling task by ID.

inputs.title: inputs
inputs.description: Inputs and sources that will mark the task as affected when comparing against touched files. When not provided, all files within the project are considered an input. When an empty list, no files are considered. Otherwise, an explicit list of inputs are considered.

local.title: local
local.description: Marks the task as local only. Local tasks do not run in CI, do not have options.cache enabled, and are marked as options.persistent.
local.markdownDescription: Marks the task as local only. Local tasks do not run in CI, do not have `options.cache` enabled, and are marked as `options.persistent`.

options.title: options
options.description: Options to control task inheritance and execution.

outputs.title: outputs
outputs.description: Outputs that will be created when the task has successfully ran. When cache is enabled, the outputs will be persisted for subsequent runs.
outputs.markdownDescription: Outputs that will be created when the task has successfully ran. When `cache` is enabled, the outputs will be persisted for subsequent runs.

platform.title: platform
platform.description: The platform in which the task will be ran in. The platform determines available binaries, lookup paths, and more. When not provided, will be automatically detected.

type.title: type
type.description: The type of task, primarily used for categorical reasons. When not provided, will be automatically determined.

TaskDependency.description: Configures another task that a task depends on.

TaskDependencyConfig.description: Expanded information about a task dependency.

args.title: args
args.description: Additional arguments to pass to this dependency when it's ran.

env.title: env
env.description: A mapping of environment variables specific to this dependency.

optional.title: optional
optional.description: Marks the dependency is optional when being inherited from the top-level.
optional.markdownDescription: Marks the dependency is optional when being inherited from the top-level.

target.title: target
target.description: The target of the depended on task.

TaskOptionsConfig.description: Options to control task inheritance and execution.

affectedFiles.title: affectedFiles
affectedFiles.description: The pattern in which affected files will be passed to the task.

allowFailure.title: allowFailure
allowFailure.description: Allows the task to fail without failing the entire pipeline.

cache.title: cache
cache.description: Caches the outputs of the task

envFile.title: envFile
envFile.description: Loads and sets environment variables from the .env file when running the task.
envFile.markdownDescription: Loads and sets environment variables from the `.env` file when running the task.

interactive.title: interactive
interactive.description: Marks the task as interactive, so that it will run in isolation, and have direct access to stdin.

mergeArgs.title: mergeArgs
mergeArgs.description: The strategy to use when merging args with an inherited task.
mergeArgs.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `args` with an inherited task.

mergeDeps.title: mergeDeps
mergeDeps.description: The strategy to use when merging deps with an inherited task.
mergeDeps.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `deps` with an inherited task.

mergeEnv.title: mergeEnv
mergeEnv.description: The strategy to use when merging env with an inherited task.
mergeEnv.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `env` with an inherited task.

mergeInputs.title: mergeInputs
mergeInputs.description: The strategy to use when merging inputs with an inherited task.
mergeInputs.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `inputs` with an inherited task.

mergeOutputs.title: mergeOutputs
mergeOutputs.description: The strategy to use when merging outputs with an inherited task.
mergeOutputs.markdownDescription: The strategy to use when merging `outputs` with an inherited task.

outputStyle.title: outputStyle
outputStyle.description: The style in which task output will be printed to the console.

persistent.title: persistent
persistent.description: Marks the task as persistent (continuously running). This is ideal for watchers, servers, or never-ending processes.
persistent.markdownDescription: Marks the task as persistent (continuously running). This is ideal for watchers, servers, or never-ending processes.

retryCount.title: retryCount
retryCount.description: The number of times a failing task will be retried to succeed.

runDepsInParallel.title: runDepsInParallel
runDepsInParallel.description: Runs direct task dependencies (via deps) in sequential order. This does not apply to indirect or transient dependencies.
runDepsInParallel.markdownDescription: Runs direct task dependencies (via `deps`) in sequential order. This _does not_ apply to indirect or transient dependencies.

runFromWorkspaceRoot.title: runFromWorkspaceRoot
runFromWorkspaceRoot.description: Runs the task from the workspace root, instead of the project root.

runInCI.title: runInCI
runInCI.description: Whether to run the task in CI or not, when executing moon ci.
runInCI.markdownDescription: Whether to run the task in CI or not, when executing `moon ci`.

shell.title: shell
shell.description: Runs the task within a shell. When not defined, runs the task directly while relying on PATH resolution.
shell.markdownDescription: Runs the task within a shell. When not defined, runs the task directly while relying on `PATH` resolution.

unixShell.title: unixShell
unixShell.description: The shell to run the task in when on a Unix-based machine.
unixShell.markdownDescription: The shell to run the task in when on a Unix-based machine.

windowsShell.title: windowsShell
windowsShell.description: The shell to run the task in when on a Windows machine.
